title: 282.041 ALTERNATIVE RECORDING FOR COUNTY FOREST ROAD.
text:
"County forest road" means a road constructed, acquired, maintained, or administered by the county for the purpose of public access and management of tax-forfeited lands that have been classified as conservation lands under this chapter.
A county board may adopt a recorded county forest road map according to section 89.715 to record county forest road prescriptive easements. For purposes of this section, "recorded county forest road map" means the official map of county forest roads.
This section does not affect the legal status or county obligations of roads and trails not shown on the recorded county forest road map.
